column4: Hello people, i am using ubuntu 12.04 and i have this weird crackling (distortion) noise whenever i playing anything(mp3,avi, audio, video all) in Ubuntu (does not happen with otherp layers)..
tried a different audio application with the same files as a test ?
virus's work different in linux as such a virus isn't really going to be hit with antivirus scanning
the issue is rookit scanners can only scan for known rootkit setups
